snippet.title: Battle Grid - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2281480/Battle_Grid/

Face relentless alien hordes, collect their resources and assemble an unstoppable squadron of mechs! In this Action Roguelite, discover game-breaking synergies, mix and match weapons and units, unlock upgrades, harvest and conquer an alien planet.
